name: Dragon Web Browser
short_description: Dragon Web Browser is a fast, lightweight and complex web browser based on Qt interface and WebKit engine. The browser is currently in alpha stage and does not have the most of the planned features but we are working on a lot of extra features which are missing in other browsers. We also focus on adding full synchronization with CrystalDragon cloud server, which will save all the user content, configuration and of course sessions with all the opened tabs and cookies.
summary: Dragon Web Browser is a fast, lightweight and complex web browser
